opportunities.title: LabLab Rise of AI Agents

opportunities.title: Liquify DeFi Tax Intelligence Hackathon
opportunities.notes: Build complete. Blocked on human DoraHacks submission.

opportunities.angle: AI/ML showcase — reuse agent orchestration or MCP tooling
opportunities.notes: Opens May 11. Next viable target after LabLab.

opportunities.title: Injective Peggy Bridge Audit Contest
opportunities.notes: Flagged by adversary review. Deadline already passed. Capability gap: no audit expertise.

opportunities.title: Limit Break AMM Audit Contest
opportunities.angle: Smart contract audit — AMM. 45-day contest on Guardian Defender.
opportunities.notes: Flagged by adversary review. High prize but team lacks audit capability. Evaluate if Solidity/Rust audit skills are acquirable.

opportunities.title: Raindrops Audit Contest
opportunities.notes: Flagged by adversary review. Low prize + capability gap = skip.

contingencyPlan.planB: DevNetwork AI+ML $12.5K (opens May 11) + Algora bounty farming ($2.5K-$4K each)
contingencyPlan.planC: Evaluate smart contract audit capability for Guardian Defender/Sherlock contests if Plan A+B yield < $10K
contingencyPlan.triggerForPlanB: LabLab dates slip past May or competition density on Liquify makes EV negative
contingencyPlan.triggerForPlanC: Both Plan A and Plan B fail to convert by June 2026
